metadata.description: Adds unforgettable special effects on S-Rank

metadata.description: Adds gamepad bindings on L3 and R3 to easily swap elements

metadata.name: CCPresetRevival
metadata.description: This brings back the preset menu, which allows you to start the game at a specific point.

metadata.name: CCRandomEvents
metadata.description: A mod that adds various new events to the game. These are triggered by talking to NPCs, and walking around maps.

metadata.name: Character Swap
metadata.description: Play as a variety of characters previously unavailable.

metadata.name: ChargedBalls
metadata.description: Replaces normal VRPs with charged VRPs.

metadata.name: Cheats
metadata.description: This mod adds cheats to CrossCode.

metadata.name: CrossCode C Edition
metadata.description: The worst mod to ever be created.

metadata.name: Discord
metadata.description: Show off your CrossCode skills in Discord

metadata.name: Element Boss
metadata.description: Adds a new boss battle to the game.

metadata.name: Extra Gamepad Options
metadata.description: Allows buttons/triggers to be swapped, and adds extra icon themes.

metadata.name: Kit Player
metadata.description: Swaps Lea's sprites to play as Kit. A sphereomancer fox.

metadata.name: Lea sits on the Title
metadata.description: Replaces default Lea's pose on the title screen.

metadata.name: LeaTriblader
metadata.description: This mod changes Lea's class to Triblader.

metadata.description: A small collection of addons to CrossCode's NG+.

metadata.description: Adds the character Qine as a party member and PvP duel.

metadata.name: Restart Button
metadata.description: Adds a button to restart the game without memory leaks

metadata.name: blades
metadata.description: Asset which replaces balls with blades, now for all classes!

metadata.name: Capped Stats
metadata.description: big numbers are very scary. :( low numbers are not scary! :)

metadata.description: Modloader for CrossCode. This or a similar modloader is needed for most mods.

metadata.description: Micro-mods by dmitmel in a single 999-in-1 package, ranging from QoL tweaks to cheats.

description.en_US: Micro-mods by dmitmel in a single 999-in-1 package, ranging from QoL tweaks to cheats.
description.ru_RU: Микро-моды от dmitmel в одной упаковке 999-in-1, начиная от QoL дополнений и заканчивая читами.

metadata.name: cursedcode
metadata.description: Cursed custom maps.

scripts.format: npm run minify-json && npm run json-beautify && npm run js-beautify

metadata.description: Allows custom items to be prepared in such a way that they 'just work'.
